name: Focused Acquisition
description: Increases chance to find double loot by 6%.

name: Loot Llama
description: Consumes a Llama Fragment to deploy a Loot Llama. Whack the Loot Llama with a harvesting tool to get building materials and crafting ingredients before it disappears.

name: Shock Tower
description: Consumes a Charge Fragment to place a Shock Tower that pulses every 0.5 seconds, and lasts for 3 seconds. Causes Chain lightning, doing a base of 12 energy damage to enemies within 1.367 tiles, stunning small enemies for .75 seconds. Can stun large enemies after multiple hits.

name: Seismic Impact
description: Punch the ground causing it to rupture knocking back medium size enemies and dealing 0.0 energy damage in a 2 tile line that conforms to the world.

name: Fault Line
description: Seismic Impact’s cooldown is lowered by 6 seconds.

name: Sustained Impact
description: Seismic Impact’s stamina cost is reduced by 15.

name: Anti-Material Charge
description: Performs a punch that travels 0.5 tiles, dealing damage to any structure punched, and a base of 90 blunt damage to enemies struck. This punch will knock back smaller enemies.

name: Long Arm of the Law
description: Increases the travel distance of Anti-Material Charge to 2 tiles.

name: Fist of the South Moon
description: Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Material Charge by 5 seconds.

name: Charged Fist
description: Anti-Material Charge can be charged up by holding down the activation key, dealing up to 150% additional damage.

name: In the Zone
description: After 5 hits in a row with a pick axe, gain In the Zone which increases pick axe damage by 24%.

name: Return To Sender
description: Seismic Impact returns to its original impact location.

name: Iron Knuckles
description: Increases the damage of Anti-Material Charge by an additional 150% against enemies. Also adds 15% damage Vulnerability to enemies for 15 seconds.

name: Punchy
description: Increases blunt weapon damage & impact by 6%/9%/12%.

name: Your Move, Creep
description: DECOY periodically damages enemies within the attraction radius.

description: Increases chance to find double loot by 6%.

name: Look What I Found!
description: Start missions with 3 Charge Fragments.

name: Bear With Me
description: Increases the duration of TEDDY by 5 seconds.

name: Phase Shift
description: Rapidly shifts 1.75 tiles in the direction currently moving. Increases movement speed by 30% for 3 seconds. Max 3 charges.

name: Double Down
description: 50% chance to find an additional Charge Fragment when collecting a Fragment.

name: Phased Out
description: Reduces the refill time of Phase Shift charges by 3 seconds.

name: Bearricade
description: Enemies damaged by TEDDY have movement and attack speed slowed by 30% for 6 seconds.

description: Increases the cooldown reduction of T.E.D.D.Y. and the Shock Tower to 50% when using a Charge Fragment.
